titleStmt.title: Cambium Regis: or, The office of His Maiesties Exchange Royall Declaring and iustifying his Maiesties right; and the conveniencie thereof. Published by authoritie.
Cambium Regis.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by B. Alsop and T. Fawcet] for B. F[isher],

notesStmt.note: Printers' and publisher's name from STC.
Includes a petition to the king from the Goldsmiths.
Reproduction of the original in the Columbia University. Library.
